text: Approval for the Magic WALLSTENT(R) Endoprosthesis.  This device is indicated for improving coronary luminal diameter in the following: 1) patients with symptomatic ischemic disease due to discreter de novo lesions in native coronary arteries (length <35mm) with a reference vessel diameter of 3.0 to 5.5mm; 2) treatment of abrupt or threatened closure in patients with failed interventional therapy in lesions with reference diameters in the range of 3.0 to 5.5mm.
